content.description:
A good, occasionally perplexing line through wonderful limestone peppered with gritty mineral deposits.

Start up in fairly straightforward fashion, with a bit of care to find a place to clip the second bolt necessary.

Continue up until the positive holds seemingly disappear. Figure out the cruxy bit through to a bit of a respite, and then continue upward and past the left side of the roof to the chains.
content.location: The second route to the left of the wide, blue streak. Ends on the left side of the roof that is to the left of the wide streak.

content.description: This is the first route on your right after you get to The Waterfall Wall. It's right on the ridge creating a border between Tatooine and The Waterfall Wall. Begin up on a pedestal with a ring bolt for your belayer to clip into. The route is like a mountaineering ridge but with some nice rock and very sweet views. It's not very hard, but the exposure is unbelievable. Huge drop offs to your right and left and the route tops out on top of the wall. A climb that will make you realize how cool 5.2 can be sometimes.
content.location: The right side of The Waterfall Wall starting on top of a small airy ledge.
